## QualifierTypes.TerritoryQualifierType.isValidTerritoryConditionValue() method

Determines whether a value is a valid condition value for a territory qualifier.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static isValidTerritoryConditionValue(value: string, acceptLowercase?: boolean): value is QualifierConditionValue;
```

The value to validate.

</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Flag indicating whether the qualifier type should accept lowercase territory codes. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

value is [QualifierConditionValue](./ts-res.qualifierconditionvalue.md)

`true` if the value is a valid condition value, `false` otherwise.
